TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConvertEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于设置 Windows 窗体控件（通过 对象绑定到数据）显示的值的格式和 unformat 值。The is used to format and unformat values displayed by a Windows Forms control that is bound to data through a object. 每当控件属性绑定到一个值时，就会发生 事件，只要绑定值更改，就会发生 事件。The event occurs whenever a control property is bound to a value and the event occurs whenever the bound value changes. 和 事件允许您创建用于显示数据的自定义格式。The and events allow you to create custom formats for displaying data. 例如，如果表中的数据为类型 ，则可以通过将 的 属性设置为 事件中的格式化值，指定数据应以本地货币格式显示。For example, if the data in a table is of type , you can specify that the data should be displayed in the local currency format--by setting the property of the to the formatted value in the event. 因此，必须 unformat 事件 中显示的值。You must consequently unformat the displayed value in the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，将 委托添加到 和 事件，并使用 属性将 添加到 控件的 中。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and uses the property to add the to the of a control. 添加到 事件的 `DecimalToCurrencyString` 事件委托使用 方法将绑定值（ 类型）的格式设置为货币。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the event, uses the method to format the bound value (a type) as currency. 添加到 事件的 `CurrencyStringToDecimal` 事件委托将控件显示的值转换回 类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the data type of the desired value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 属性，您可以检查要将值转换为的属性的类型。The property enables you to check the type of the property that the value is being converted to. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性来确定是否可以继续将一种类型转换为另一种类型。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the conversion of one type to another can proceed. `DecimalToCurrencyString` 方法测试 是否为字符串。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` method tests whether the is a string. 否则，代码将退出方法。If not, the code exits the method. 同样，`CurrencyStringToDecimal` 方法测试 是否为 ，如果不 `true`，则退出。Similarly, the `CurrencyStringToDecimal` method tests whether the is a , and exits if it is not `true`. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs.DesiredType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的值取决于返回 的事件。The value contained by the property depends on the event in which the is returned. 可以在 事件或 事件中返回 。The can be returned in either the event or the event. 如果 事件中返回 ，则 属性包含该数据源的无格式属性值。When the is returned in the event, the property contains the unformatted property value of the data source. 在 事件中，可以读取属性值，设置值的格式，然后将 属性重置为新的（格式）值，从而设置数据绑定控件中显示的值。Within the event, you can read the property value, format the value, and reset the property to the new (formatted) value, thereby setting the value displayed in the data-bound control. 当 事件中返回 时，属性包含数据绑定控件的自定义格式值。When the is returned in the event, the property contains the custom-formatted value of the data-bound control. 在 事件中，必须读取格式化值，对其进行分析，然后将其转换回与数据源相同的数据类型。Within the event, you must read the formatted value, parse it, and convert it back to the same data type as the data source. 然后，您可以将 属性重置为未格式化的值，从而设置数据源的值。You can then reset the property to the unformatted value, and thereby set the value of the data source. 若要确定数据源的类型，请检查 属性值。To determine the type of the data source, examine the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 ，将 委托添加到 和 事件，并使用 属性将 添加到 控件的 中。The following code example creates a , adds a delegate to both the and events, and uses the property to add the to the of a control. 添加到 事件的 `DecimalToCurrencyString` 事件委托使用 方法将绑定值（ 类型）的格式设置为货币。The `DecimalToCurrencyString` event delegate, which is added to the event, uses the method to format the bound value (a type) as currency. 添加到 事件的 `CurrencyStringToDecimal` 事件委托将控件显示的值转换回 类型。The `CurrencyStringToDecimal` event delegate, which is added to the event, converts the value displayed by the control back to the type. [!code-cpp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ConvertEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ConvertEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
